release.action: Verbose time difference had a bug. If the time difference between two dates was in milliseconds the verbose time difference used to show in 23H, 59m, etc. Fixed it.
New API added for immutable Day class.
StringUtils have new API that helps to replace whole words from a given text.
New API has been added in CExport. The constructor now works with a java.util.Properties directly.

RandomStringGenerator API has been refactorred. The class now exhibits new methods and feature of generating unique case sensitive as well as case insensitive random strings based on the given format..
The PBEEncryptionRoutine class has been modified to handle the ArrayIndexOutOfBounds exception.
Refer to the ChangeLog.html for all previous releases.
